ingredients.item: 380g pack essential Waitrose British Chicken 2 Breast Fillets, thinly sliced

instructions.step: Cook the pasta in boiling water for 9-10 minutes or until tender, then drain.

Heat the oil and fry the chicken and pepper for 5 minutes, add the sweetcorn, pesto and crème fraîche and cook for 1-2 minutes. Check that the chicken is cooked through with no pink meat. Stir in the pasta and basil, and season to taste.
